page.title: 09The Jubilee Sports Centre
page.content: Work started on the Jubilee centre in 1977, the year of the{Queen's Silver {Jubilee,}and was opened two years later. The centre was designed by the Council's architect and the buildings and pitches stand in 16 hectares of ground. The facilities are open to the public seven days a week from 8.30a.m. until 10.45p.m. and a wide variety of sports activities are offered. The Centre is managed by a{Mr. Tasker with four qualified recreation officers. Over 1,000 people per week use the facilties which are available to all age groups. The Centre is used for many other social events as well as for sport.
